name: Ultimate Mouse Game
description:
Ultimate Mouse Game is a unique video game where you use the mouse cursor to beat levels, attack enemies and defeat bosses. It was made by an indie game developer with six years of experience! The game features many levels, challenges, enemies and bossfights. It also contains original music. A unique game available for free!

Some game art

Features:

  • Unique cursor-based controls
  • Three large levels with 100+ small sections
  • Three challenging bossfights
  • 20+ different enemies and items
  • 15 achievements to unlock

What you get:

A zip file containing the executable file to play the game and the game's soundtrack.

How to play:

Just unzip the .zip file and run the executable.

Runs on:

Windows

The game is far from done yet. This is the first playable version, but the game will get major updates in the future. Donations to support the project are welcome!
